Title: Web RSS Builder
Description: Web RSS Builder is a program to manage RSS files using web interface and Silverlight. With a standard ASP.NET authentication and authorization.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Web RSS Builder is an application for managing RSS files using web interface and Silverlight, with a standard ASP.NET authentication and role based authorization. This application to be used on Internet Information Server (IIS) to manage manually local RSS files.

If you want to an insight about how this application architecture, design, and implementation. You can check the articles I wrote on Code Project:

  • Web RSS Builder Part-1: Generic XML data source for ASP.Net and Silverlight 
  • Web RSS Builder Part-2: The ASP.Net application.
  • Web RSS Builder Part-3: The Silverlight Application. 

This application is written by: Sofian Alsalman Hnaide
